name: Potato Pasto with Garlic Tomato Spinach Sauce
description: Dive into a plate of Potato Pasta with Garlic Tomato Spinach Sauce, a perfect blend of high-fiber and nutritious ingredients designed to suit your healthy lifestyle. With fresh spinach, ripe tomatoes, crunchy carrots, and a hint of garlic, this dish is not just good for you but also packed with flavors that will delight your taste buds.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by peeling and dicing the potato into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the tomatoes, and carrot into small pieces and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the 12 cloves of garlic and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the eggplant into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and add the diced potato. Cook for about 5 minutes until tender but still firm.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, add the extra virgin olive oil and sauté the sliced garlic until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and carrot to the skillet and cook until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Add the eggplant to the skillet and continue to cook for an additional 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the fresh spinach leaves and cook until they wilt, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sautéed vegetables with the boiled potatoes in a large serving bowl and toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
